step_bound_pos_iff:
theorem step_bound_pos_iff {n : ‚Ñï} : 0 < step_bound n ‚Üî 0 < n :=
  zero_lt_mul_right <| by positivity
#align step_bound_pos_iff step_bound_pos_iff
step_bound_mono:
theorem step_bound_mono : Monotone step_bound := fun a b h =>
  nat.mul_le_mul h <| Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right (by norm_num) h
#align step_bound_mono step_bound_mono

#align seven_le_initial_bound seven_le_initial_bound

    (4 : expr‚Ñù) ^ P.parts.card * exprm ‚â§ u.card := by

theorem le_step_bound : id ‚â§ step_bound := fun n => Nat.le_mul_of_pos_right <| pow_pos (by norm_num) n
#align le_step_bound le_step_bound
le_initial_bound:
theorem le_initial_bound : l ‚â§ initial_bound Œµ l :=
  (le_max_left _ _).trans <| le_max_right _ _
#align le_initial_bound le_initial_bound
le_bound:
theorem le_bound : l ‚â§ bound Œµ l :=
  (le_initial_bound Œµ l).trans <| initial_bound_le_bound Œµ l
#align le_bound le_bound
initial_bound_pos:
theorem initial_bound_pos : 0 < initial_bound Œµ l :=
  Nat.succ_pos'.trans_le <| seven_le_initial_bound _ _
#align initial_bound_pos initial_bound_pos
initial_bound_le_bound:
theorem initial_bound_le_bound : initial_bound Œµ l ‚â§ bound Œµ l :=
  (id_le_iterate_of_id_le le_step_bound _ _).trans <| Nat.le_mul_of_pos_right <| by positivity
#align initial_bound_le_bound initial_bound_le_bound

theorem hundred_lt_pow_initial_bound_mul {Œµ : expr‚Ñù} (hŒµ : 0 < Œµ) (l : ‚Ñï) : 100 < 4 ^ initial_bound Œµ l * Œµ ^ 5 :=
  by

    Nat.cast_max, Nat.cast_max]

    exact lt_max_of_lt_right (lt_max_of_lt_right <| Nat.lt_floor_add_one _)
  ¬∑ exact log_pos (by norm_num)
  ¬∑ exact div_pos (by norm_num) (pow_pos hŒµ 5)

    (hPŒµ : 100 ‚â§ 4 ^ P.parts.card * Œµ ^ 5) (hŒµ : Œµ ‚â§ 1) : 100 ‚â§ exprm := by
  exact_mod_cast

hundred_div_Œµ_pow_five_le_m:

    (hPŒµ : 100 ‚â§ 4 ^ P.parts.card * Œµ ^ 5) : 100 / Œµ ^ 5 ‚â§ exprm :=

theorem eps_pow_five_pos (hPŒµ : 100 ‚â§ 4 ^ P.parts.card * Œµ ^ 5) : 0 < Œµ ^ 5 :=
  pos_of_mul_pos_right ((by norm_num : (0 : expr‚Ñù) < 100).trans_le hPŒµ) <| pow_nonneg (by norm_num) _

theorem add_div_le_sum_sq_div_card (hst : s ‚äÜ t) (f : Œπ ‚Üí ùïú) (d : ùïú) (hx : 0 ‚â§ x)

theorem a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card : expra + 1 ‚â§ 4 ^ P.parts.card :=
